009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import java.awt.GridLayout;
012import java.awt.Label;
013import java.awt.Panel;
014import java.awt.TextField;
015import java.util.Locale;
016
017import ij.IJ;
018import ij.ImagePlus;
019import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
020import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
025import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
026import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
027
028/**
029 * <p>
030 * ImageJ plugin, applies a configurable affine transformation to the current
031 * image. See Sec. 21.1.3 of [1] for details. Optionally opens a sample image if
032 * no image is currently open.
033 * </p>
034 * <p>
035 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
036 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
037 * </p>
038 * 
039 * @author WB
040 * @version 2022/11/28
041 * 
042 * @see ImageMapper
043 * @see AffineMapping2D
044 */
045public class Map_Linear_Affine_Matrix implements PlugInFilter {
046
047        private static String[][] ElemNames = {
048                        { "a00", "a01", "a02" },
049                        { "a10", "a11", "a12" }};
050
051        private static double[][] A = {
052                        { 1, 0, 0 },
053                        { 0, 1, 0 }};
054        
055        /**
056         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
057         * is currently open.
058         */
059        public Map_Linear_Affine_Matrix() {
060                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage()) {
061                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
062                }
063        }
064                
065        @Override
066        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
067                return DOES_ALL;
068        }
069
070        @Override
071        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
072                if (!runDialog()) {
073                        return;
074                }
075                AffineMapping2D imap = new AffineMapping2D(A).getInverse();
076                new ImageMapper(imap).map(ip);
077        }
078
079        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
080
081        private boolean runDialog() {
082                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
083                gd.addMessage("Affine forward transformation matrix (source to target):");
084                
085                TextField[] txtField = new TextField[A[0].length * A.length];
086                Panel panel = makePanel(A, ElemNames, txtField);
087                gd.addPanel(panel);
088                
089                gd.showDialog();
090                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
091                        return false;
092                }
093                
094                return getPanelValues(A, txtField);
095        }
096
097        private Panel makePanel(double[][] vals, String[][] names, TextField[] textfield) {
098                Panel panel = new Panel();
099                panel.setLayout(new GridLayout(vals.length, vals[0].length * 2));
100                int i = 0;
101                for (int row = 0; row < vals.length; row++) {
102                        for (int col = 0; col < vals[row].length; col++) {
103                                textfield[i] = new TextField(String.format(Locale.US, "%.2f", vals[row][col]));
104                                panel.add(textfield[i]);
105                                panel.add(new Label(names[row][col]));
106                                i++;
107                        }
108                }
109                return panel;
110        }
111
112        private boolean getPanelValues(double[][] A, TextField[] tf) {
113                int i = 0; 
114                for (int r = 0; r < A.length; r++) {
115                        for (int c = 0; c < A[0].length; c++) {
116                                try {
117                                        A[r][c] = Double.valueOf(tf[i].getText());
118                                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {     
119                                        IJ.log("NumberFormatException: " + e.getMessage());
120                                        return false;
121                                }
122                                i++;
123                        }
124                }
125                return true;
126        }
127
128}
